attributes.action: Roll out Voluntary Right to Buy across UK for HA tenants
attributes.additional_details: Long term housing association tenants should have the option to consider the voluntary right to buy. The gov so not currently have anything in place for those in this category.
attributes.background: Allow Housing association tenants to have the voluntary right to buy outside of the postcode pilots

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/629344
